title: Authorizes a physician assistant, acting under the supervision of a physician, to sign death certificates in like manner as physicians
summary: Authorizes a physician assistant, acting under the supervision of a physician, to sign death certificates in like manner as physicians and imposes upon physician assistants the same duties that physicians have in connection therewith.
